languages.text: {n}Неловко ускользая взглядом, Кассия скрывает залитое румянцем лицо за пологом серебристых волос.{/n} "Я... С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Неловко ускользая взглядом, Кассия скрывает залитое румянцем лицо за пологом серебристых волос.{/n} "Я... С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."
languages.original_text: {n}Неловко ускользая взглядом, Кассия скрывает залитое румянцем лицо за пологом серебристых волос.{/n} "Я... С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia desvía vergonzosamente la mirada y oculta su rostro sonrojado tras una cortina de plateados cabellos.{/n} «Yo... Con su permiso, Lord Capitán, quisiera estar sola un rato. Y pensar en... lo que ha ocurrido».
languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia desvía vergonzosamente la mirada y oculta su rostro sonrojado tras una cortina de plateados cabellos.{/n} «Yo... Con su permiso, Lord Capitán, quisiera estar sola un rato. Y pensar en... lo que ha ocurrido».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは気まずそうに目をそらし、赤くなった顔を銀の髪で隠した。{/n}「あの…お許しいただけるなら、しばしひとりにしていただけませんか、ロード・キャプテン。今、何が起きたのか…じっくり考えたいと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは気まずそうに目をそらし、赤くなった顔を銀の髪で隠した。{/n}「あの…お許しいただけるなら、しばしひとりにしていただけませんか、ロード・キャプテン。今、何が起きたのか…じっくり考えたいと思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅尴尬地移开目光，羞红的脸藏在银色的长发后面。{/n}“我……恕我冒昧，舰长大人，我想一个人待一会，好好思考一下……刚刚发生的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅尴尬地移开目光，羞红的脸藏在银色的长发后面。{/n}“我……恕我冒昧，舰长大人，我想一个人待一会，好好思考一下……刚刚发生的事情。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gênée, Cassia détourne le regard et cache son visage rougissant derrière un rideau de cheveux argentés.{/n} « Je... Si vous me le permettez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais rester seule un moment. Pour réfléchir à... ce qu'il vient de se passer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gênée, Cassia détourne le regard et cache son visage rougissant derrière un rideau de cheveux argentés.{/n} « Je... Si vous me le permettez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais rester seule un moment. Pour réfléchir à... ce qu'il vient de se passer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia wendet betreten den Blick ab und verbirgt ihr errötendes Gesicht hinter einem Vorhang aus silbernen Haaren.{/n} "Ich ... Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, Lord Captain, wäre ich gern kurz allein. Um darüber nachzudenken ... was geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia wendet betreten den Blick ab und verbirgt ihr errötendes Gesicht hinter einem Vorhang aus silbernen Haaren.{/n} "Ich ... Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, Lord Captain, wäre ich gern kurz allein. Um darüber nachzudenken ... was geschehen ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini çekinerek kaçıran Cassia, gümüş saçlarını kızaran yüzüne siper ediyor.{/n} "Şöyle ki... İzninle biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Tüm... Olan biteni düşünmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Awkwardly averting her eyes, Cassia hides her blushing face behind a curtain of silver hair.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini çekinerek kaçıran Cassia, gümüş saçlarını kızaran yüzüne siper ediyor.{/n} "Şöyle ki... Gittiğinde biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Tüm... Olan biteni düşünmek istiyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
